review: Before purchasing this item, I checked the specifications to ensure it would work with my current DSL service.  No required minimum speed was specified, only "high speed internet service".  Since I am able to stream movies to my Kindle Fire device, I assumed the Amazon Fire TV (with quad-core processor) would have no problems.  Wrong!  Instead of buffering based on data speed, this device simply freezes every 30 seconds.  Unacceptable.Amazon - If there is a minimum internet data speed requirement for Amazon Fire TV, please *clearly* list the exact threshold required.  Don't just say "high speed internet service", since DSL technically falls into this *vague* category.
author: JSP
